context_of_use: This use case allows customers to add products to their cart and complete the checkout process to create an order.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase multiple items conveniently
description: This use case enables customers to add products to their cart and complete the checkout process to create an order.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
Customer has selected products to purchase.
assumptions: The customer has a valid payment method available.
The system is operational and accessible.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
The system shall enable customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer adds products to cart → System updates cart with selected products.
2. Customer initiates checkout → System displays checkout options.
3. Customer selects payment method → System processes payment.
4. System confirms order creation → System notifies customer of successful order.
